name: Heavy Bike Stunts Racing
description:
Heavy Bike Stunts Racing!!!
Drive fast fury motorbikes in amazing extreme bike riding game 3D. Boost the speed of heavy gp bikes to enjoy insanely smooth motorcycle extreme asphalt driving. Simple bike racing games has no match for this stuntman bike racing game, its just like a wipeout type bike stunts in which you have to avoid bouncing balls, moving platform, punches and speed pendulums.
Features

-Realistic bike Physics
-Impressive graphics
-Realistic stunt
-Easy control
-Amazing Stuntman Rider
